articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Fisheries Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Fisheries Station 
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, gave field guidance to the August 25 Fisheries Station under KPA 313 Unit. 
					He visited the fisheries station on May 27 and asked the manager of the station to send him a letter if it netted 4,000 tons of fish so that he might know the happy news.
					
					The employees of the station caught more than 4,000 tons of fishes in a matter of six months and sent a letter to the supreme commander.
					
					 After receiving the letter, he sent to the manager the following autographic reply expressing his loving care and trust: 
					
					 "To Comrade Yun Yong Il,
					
					 I received your letter with pleasure. 
					
					 I send my regards to the employees of your fisheries station who achieved great success in fishing.
					
					 Thank you.
					
					 I believe you will make big hauls of fishes like a rich harvest next year, too. 
					
					 I wish all of you good health.
					
					 Kim Jong Un
					
					 December 11, 2013."
					
					He visited the far-off fisheries station again after sending his autographic reply to it. 
					
					 Saying he would like to see fishes caught, he moved to the salted fish store and fish refrigerating chamber 
					
					 Looking at the chamber packed with frozen fishes, we are reluctant to leave here, he said, inviting officials to take a photo taken against the background of fishes to be supplied to service personnel. He had a picture taken with officials of the station. 
					
					 He said in an excited tone: "How President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il would have been pleased if they had seen this gratifying scene. It makes me remember Kim Jong Il who would be moved to tears whenever he was told that service personnel had been well fed." 
					
					 He highly praised Manager Yun Yong Il as hero who devotedly carried out the order of the party by leading the employees and extended thanks to all employees of the fisheries station on behalf of the Supreme Commander of the KPA. 
					
					 He showed such profound loving care for them as inviting them to come to Pyongyang so that they might visit the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces to present a report of loyalty to them and have a photo session with him. 
					
					 He went round the newly arranged the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the station. 
					
					 He stressed the need for the station to catch more fishes next year, setting the target for the station to attain and specifying ways for doing so. 
					
					 He had a picture taken with the officials and employees of the station, expressing expectation and belief that they would net greater quantity of fishes and supply them to the service personnel. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun, vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Bier of Late Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Bier of Late Kim Kuk Thae
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Sunday visited the bier of Kim Kuk Thae, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee, and expressed deep condolences over his death.
					 Laid before the bier of the deceased was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK and the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Un paid silent tribute to the deceased and looked round the bier with bitter sorrow over the loss of the revolutionary soldier loyal to the party who devoted himself to the struggle for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the leadership of the party and leader until the last moments of his life.
					
					 He met the bereaved families of the deceased and expressed profound condolences and warm consolation to them. 
					
					 Among the visitors were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Won Hong, Kim Pyong Hae, Ri Jae Il, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Bahrain
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Bahrain
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Hamad Bin Isa alÔºçKhalifa, king of Bahrain, on Monday on the occasion of the national day of Bahrain.
					 The message wished the king good health, happiness and success in his work for achieving the social stability and economic prosperity.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Swear Their Loyalty to Supreme Commander
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Swear Their Loyalty to Supreme Commander 
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) held a meeting at the square of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday to vow to hold Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the unitary center of unity and leadership and protect him at the cost of their lives.
					 The participants paid tribute to the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter of pledge was read out by Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.
					
					 He said that the service personnel of the KPA who gathered in the sacred temple of Juche pay highest tribute and extend eternal glory to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who dedicated all their lives to the country and the revolution.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea and built a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, on this land, performing immortal exploits which would shine long in the history of the country.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il led all service personnel and people along the road of victory with his iron will and superhuman energy, putting the national dignity and power onto the highest stage and consolidating the powerful political and military bases capable of steadily advancing the Korean revolution.
					
					 The KPA will hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the unitary center of unity and leadership and protect him unto death true to the behests of Kim Jong Il, he declared, and continued:
					
					 The KPA is the eternal army of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and it will always remain the army of Kim Jong Un defending him unto death and upholding his leadership only.
					
					 All participants solemnly pledged to become human bullets and bombs, singing the song of faith that all service personnel and people know Kim Jong Un only, and further glorify the glorious tradition of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces, which was started with the spirit of defending Kim Il Sung unto death and carried forward with the spirit of defending Kim Jong Il unto death, with the determination to protect Kim Jong Un unto death.
					
					 The meeting was followed by a march-past of service personnel of the KPA ground, navy and air and anti-air force and students of the revolutionary schools.
					
					 Present at the meeting were officers of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, officers of units and military academies at all levels, service personnel of the KPA and students of the revolutionary schools.

articles.title: Ecuadorian President Hopes for Closer Friendship with DPRK
articles.content:
Ecuadorian President Hopes for Closer Friendship with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Rafael Correa, president of Ecuador, met Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, at the presidential palace on Dec. 12. Jon is leading the DPRK delegation of youth and students to the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students.
					 The president said that the DPRK delegation's participation in the festival greatly inspired the Ecuadorian people in their struggle against imperialism, wishing the bilateral friendly relations would grow stronger.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il and paid tribute. They included members of the economic and commerce councilors corps, the Chinese and Vietnamese embassies, UN FAO, UNDP, UNICEF, WHO and WFP missions here, family of Zhang Wei-hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family of Chai Shiying, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family of Kim Sun Ok, Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, and the family of overseas Korean Son Won Thae.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civilian Exchange, the Kyoto Women Council for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, the family of Kim Chol, an anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, and Jong Il Sim, a widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Monday.
					
					 A floral basket sent by Ekan Ikeguchi, high priest of Saifukuji-Temple of Japan, was placed before the statues on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by foreign crewmen in Hungnam Port on Monday on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Panamanian-flagged ship Hui Xiang.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to the country's prosperity and the people's happiness.
					
					 They stressed that his whole life is the one of a peerless patriot and distinguished revolutionary who devoted himself to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche with the intense loyalty to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They said that the Korean people are making great successes in building a thriving socialist nation and waging a dynamic struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, single-mindedly united around the party.
					
					 They emphasized that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the head of the party, state and army.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Kumsong Foodstuff Factory Increases Production
articles.content:
Kumsong Foodstuff Factory Increases Production
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- This year, the Kumsong Foodstuff Factory located in Kwangbok Street here has increased foodstuff production 10 percent more than that of the previous year.
					  The pancake workshop of the factory, in particular, is taking the lead in increasing the production.
					
					  The workshop was honored with a visit paid by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who devoted all his life to the wellbeing and happiness of the people, on September 8, Juche 100 (2011). At that time, he, pleased to see the flow of pancakes, indicated the tasks to be fulfilled in managing and operating the workshop.
					
					  True to his instructions, the officials and employees of the factory have achieved such successes as expanding the variety of pancakes, which are very popular among the people.
					
					  Chief Engineer of the factory Jong Kun Chol, when interviewed by KCNA, said that the instructions given by Kim Jong Il have encouraged all the officials and employees of the factory to turn out in the effort for increased production, well aware of the importance of their job for improving the people's diet.

articles.title: Persons of Merits in Juche-based Architecture
articles.content:
Persons of Merits in Juche-based Architecture
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The history of construction in the DPRK, started with a Pothong River improvement project after Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, is woven with proud annals of great creation and changes in which a large number of monumental edifices took their shapes one after another in the country.
					 In those days many architects and builders devoted all their wisdom and energies to carrying into practice the Workers' Party of Korea's construction plan. 
					
					 Among them is Kim Ung Sang, ex-chairman of the State Construction Commission. He made a big contribution to designing the Pothong River improvement project, working as chairman of the Architectural Union of North Korea (at that time), deeply trusted by President Kim Il Sung, just after the country's liberation. 
					
					 For 30-odd years he took part in designing and construction of grandiose structures and apartment houses in Pyongyang such as the main buildings of Kim Il Sung University and Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Rodong Sinmun, Pyongyang Grand Theater and Okryu Restaurant. He also contributed to building the Wangjaesan Revolutionary Site, International Friendship Exhibition House, Grand People's Study House and other edifices across the country under the guidance of General Scretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Hui, former director of the Anju branch of the South Phyongan Provincial City Design Office, took part in drafting the architectural design for a new country, being active as a member of the Architectural Union of North Korea from September 1945.
					
					 In the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War period, he undertook a task to map out the master plan for postwar rehabilitation of Pyongyang city. And he played a key role in designing for construction of capital and local cities like Sukchon, Anju and Chongjin, working at an important post of the construction designing field until the last moments of his life. 
					
					 Kim Ji Hang, former chief engineer of the Pyongyang City Design Office, too, made contributions to designing the Korean Revolution Museum, International Friendship Exhibition House, Pyongyang city construction and other major projects.
					
					 Besides, Kim Pyong Sik, ex-director general of the General Bureau of Pyongyang City Construction, So Sang Jun, former chief of the South Phyongan Provincial Youth Construction Brigade and many other architects and builders became persons of merits remembered by the people, under the deep care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korea's Introduction of Latest War Equipment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korea's Introduction of Latest War Equipment
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers introduced and deployed hundreds of Spikes from Israel. They are mulling massively purchasing the latest war equipment including various kinds of missiles from the U.S., Germany and France by spending billions of U.S. dollars, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 This dangerous act of escalating the arms race in the Northeast Asian region arouses great concerns at home and abroad.
					
					 The puppet forces' move to massively introduce war means for making a preemptive attack is prompted by their sinister intention to ignite a nuclear war against the north at any cost.
					
					 The north-south relations are in an extremely confrontational phase. It is not too much to say that only physical conflict is left in the north-south relations as dialogue and cooperation have gone and distrust and confrontation escalate day by day. 
					
					 The traitorous ruling forces of south Korea, thrown into the worst ruling crisis, are trying to find a way-out by provoking a war against the north. As part of it, they are making frantic efforts to introduce the latest war equipment.
					
					  The south Korean puppet forces should stop at once the foolish act, the commentary said, adding that latest war equipment, whatever they may be, will be reduced into the heap of scrap iron by the merciless attack of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: Japan's Anti-DPRK Action under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Anti-DPRK Action under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- In Japan, the National Security Council was formed and its first session took place some days ago.
					 It was attended by Prime Minister Abe, and the foreign minister, the defense minister and the chief Cabinet secretary of Japan.
					
					 What topped the agenda at the session was the item on the situation in Korea. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in a bylined commentary Monday:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries discussed the situation in Korea, peddling an absurd story about the DPRK. This was a deliberate act, not one prompted by their ignorance of politics.
					
					 What the Japanese reactionaries seek is to make the "story of threat" from the DPRK a fait accompli, justify their anti-DPRK moves and realize their sinister aim.
					
					 By pursuing the hostile policy toward the DPRK Japan seeks to render the relations with the DPRK extremely bitter and confrontational.
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries start the military reinvasion of the DPRK, it will lead to the complete ruin of Japan.
					
					 If Japanese politicians have reasonable thinking power, they should bear this in mind and behave with far-sightedness.
					
					 The wisest option for Japan is to opt for improving the relations with the DPRK after dropping the hopeless hostile policy toward the DPRK and redeem its past crimes.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities are truly concerned about the security of their country, they had better repeal their policy of converting Japan into a military giant and their hostile policy toward the DPRK, sincerely make an apology for its past crimes and redeem them, not resorting to the moves to whitewash and deny the history of their past crimes.

articles.title: Construction of Pyongyang Associated with Feats of Peerlessly Great Men (3)
articles.content:
Construction of Pyongyang Associated with Feats of Peerlessly Great Men (3)
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang has taken on new looks as befitting a city of a highly civilized socialist country under the energetic guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who has creditably put into practice the idea of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on architecture.
					 Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to edifices under construction in Pyongyang one after another, indicating the orientations and ways to build them on a high level. 
					
					 Thanks to his guidance, Changjon Street in the heart of Pyongyang was rebuilt into a cradle for a highly civilized life of the people, boasting of skyscraping and high-rise apartment houses, People's Theatre, Pyongyang Children's Department Store and other service centers.
					
					 He led to a successful completion the construction projects initiated and planned by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in his lifetime, including Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Ryugyong Health Complex, People's Open-air Ice Rink, Pyongyang Folklore Park and sports parks.
					
					 Kim Jong Un worked out a grand plan this year to usher in a new heyday of construction. 
					
					 He saw to it that the spirit of the "speed on Masik Pass" was fully displayed in all construction sites, while giving ceaseless field guidance to them.
					
					 He gave guidance to mapping out the layout of the Munsu Water Park more than 110 times and often visited its construction site to indicate the ways to complete the project on the highest level. 
					
					 Under his energetic guidance the construction of the park was completed in nine months and Unha Scientist Street in seven months.
					
					 This year, Pyongyang witnessed the construction of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Mirim Riding Club, Ryugyong Dental Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital, apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, etc, all of which are very good in architectural and aesthetic aspects.
					
					 Thanks to the immortal leadership exploits performed by the peerlessly great men in the construction of Pyongyang, a rosy future is in store for the city.

articles.title: South Koreans Urge Japan to Make Apology for Past Crimes
articles.content:
South Koreans Urge Japan to Make Apology for Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- There took place a memorial service for the fallen victims of sex slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in Changwon of South Kyongsang Province, south Korea on Dec. 12.
					 Present there were victims of the sex slavery, citizens, students of high schools and other people of different strata.
					
					 Speakers at the memorial service criticized Japan for distorting the past history of sex slavery and refusing the liquidation of its crimes.
					
					 They said that atrocities of Japan which claimed innocent people are unpardonable.
					
					 In order to console the victims it is necessary to deter Japan from distorting history and force it to make an apology, they held.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges Puppet Chief Executive to Apologize for Interference in Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges Puppet Chief Executive to Apologize for Interference in Election
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of the Young Men's Christian Association of south Korea released a declaration on the situation on December 12 denouncing puppet power organs' illegal interference in the election.
					 The declaration said that it has been disclosed that the Intelligence Service and other power organs were illegally involved in the "presidential election" last year.
					
					 Such crimes are unpardonable as they bring society back to the "yusin" era, it charged.
					
					 It held that those involved should be severely punished as the truth about the case was exposed.
					
					 It demanded Park Geun Hye apologize for the case.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Abolition of SL and Release of Detainees
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Abolition of SL and Release of Detainees
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean civic and public organizations including the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Association of Victims of the "Security Law" held a meeting in Seoul on December 8 as regards the authorities' unreasonable suppression.
					 Speakers at the meeting said that candlelight actions are sweeping across south Korea to demand the probe into the truth about the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election.
					
					 They said that the authorities are busy cracking down on the participants in the actions by labeling them "forces following the north" and, at the same time, resorting to the indiscriminate suppression of the reunification movement.
					
					 They noted that they will struggle against the unreasonable suppression by the authorities.
					
					 They strongly demanded the implementation of the inter-Korean joint declarations and release of detainees and prisoners of conscience including members of the organizations for the reunification movement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Personages of Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Personages of Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a remembrance meeting, a Korean book and photo exhibition and a film show in Finland, Brazil and Indonesia on December 7 and 11.
					
					 Displayed on the front walls of venues of the events were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were photos documenting the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and exploits of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were Korean books including works of peerlessly great men and photos showing successes made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektu Association of Finland said that the noble life of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the people's happiness and prosperity will always be cherished in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 Friends in Finland are convinced that the Korean people will surely build a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever, he said.
					
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Il devoted himself to carrying out the human cause of independence and turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist fortress equipped with powerful war deterrence, adding that his life was a great one.
					
					 He said that progressive mankind will always remember the exploits of Kim Jong Il who led the DPRK to only victory in the political and military confrontation with the U.S. through his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched the Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article titled "Shining exploits" on December 5 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il worked as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, taking on his shoulders the destiny of the motherland and the nation. During the days he defended socialism from the worst trials and adversities unprecedented in history and made the DPRK demonstrate its might as a political, ideological and military power, it added.
					
					 It noted that he established the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism as required by the changed situation, comprehensively applied it to all fields of the revolution and construction and thus provided a sure guarantee for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and successfully advancing the cause of socialism.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 He directed big efforts to strengthening the defence capabilities and thus developed the revolutionary armed forces into a matchless army, turned the DPRK into a state manufacturing and launching satellites and a nuclear weapons state and consolidated the political and ideological position of the DPRK as firm as a rock.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK modernized or newly built a lot of production bases, gave face-lifting to the appearance of the country and laid a firm material and technological foundation for the building of a thriving nation, closely united with one mind under the Songun leadership of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the Korean people are holding him as the eternal chairman of the NDC in high esteem.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Brazilian, Myanmar Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Brazilian, Myanmar Personages
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of Brazil and Myanmar issued statements on Dec. 6 and 7 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Jose Gil de Almeida, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, said that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits guaranteeing the eternal foundation of socialist Korea and its bright future.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Il for glorifying the Juche idea, the Songun idea as the eternal guiding idea in the era of independence and developing the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army into the ever-victorious guiding force, invincible socialist power and matchless and invincible combat ranks.
					
					 He noted that exploits Kim Jong Il performed all his life will shine long as the noblest heritage guaranteeing the victory of the socialist cause in the DPRK and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The general director of a publishing house of Myanmar said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a distinguished leader and benevolent father who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country, the happiness of the people and peace and security of the world till the last moment of his life. His extraordinary exploits will be everlasting.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the party, army and people of the DPRK to build a thriving nation and accomplish the cause of national reunification by successfully carrying forward the noble cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a thriving nation and reunify the country without fail under his leadership true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Beninese Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Beninese Figures
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Cotonou, Benin on December 4 and 6 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretry Kim Jong Il.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said in his speech that the steel-like unity and cohesion of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) would be unthinkable apart from the extraordinary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an organizational and ideological crystal based on one centre, one thought and purpose, the president said, and went on:
					
					 He made the whole party arm itself with the idea of leader and be rallied close around the leader and form a perfect harmonious whole in which it acts as one under the guidance of the leader.
					
					 The party, army and people form a harmonious whole in the DPRK thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il, an unprecedented reality in the world history of politics.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, president of the Beninese National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il, said that Kim Jong Il held aloft the banner of Songun late in the last century when the imperialists became evermore undisguised in their high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 A war could be averted on the Korean Peninsula, an acute hotspot, and peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world defended as he strengthened the military capabilities in every way.
					
					 The Songun politics has helped the DPRK develop into a full-fledged political, ideological and military power and lay a firm springboard for the building of an economic power.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, praised Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly great man, for taking warm loving care of the people, adding that it was his view of life to serve the people and dedicate himself to them.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was formed in Nakhodka, Russia on December 12.
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events for praising the noble revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Tanzanian Committee for Remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was formed in Dar es Salaam on December 7.
					 Maina, secretary general of the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il between December 7 and 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Dominica
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Dominican Committee for Remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was formed in Santo Domingo on December 9.
					 Jose Miguel Mejia, secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events for highly praising Kim Jong Il's exploits on the occasion of the anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Songs Praising Leader Resound in DPRK: Chinese Paper
articles.content:
Songs Praising Leader Resound in DPRK: Chinese Paper
 Beijing, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Chinese newspaper Global Times on Dec. 13 carried an article titled "Songs of leader resound loudly in DPRK" which was sent by its correspondent in the DPRK. 
					 The article said:
					
					 "We Know You Only" and "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only" are the most noteworthy songs in the DPRK now. 
					
					 These songs praising Marshal Kim Jong Un were carried by Rodong Sinmun on Dec. 9 and 10 and they are being rapidly spread in the DPRK. 
					
					 "Our Leader Loved by People" was a typical song most representative of the Korean people's will to uphold Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Korean songs praising Kim Jong Un include light songs and lyric ones, notably "Ardent Desire" often heard in the streets of the DPRK. 
					
					 This song reflects the desire of the service personnel and other people of the DPRK ardently wishing for safety and good health of Kim Jong Un, who is providing ceaseless field guidance for the people despite all troubles. 
					
					 This song is very popular among the people. 
					
					 There are also many songs praising President Kim Il Sung and lGeneral Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" are most typical of them. 
					
					 These songs are immortal revolutionary hymns played at meetings, military parades, mass demonstrations and other large events in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Paper of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Paper of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- La Prosperite, the paper of DR Congo, carried the detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" on December 6.
					 The paper carried a preface as follows, illustrated with a portrait of smiling General Secretary Kim Jong Il:
					
					 The Korean people commemorate the 2nd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il on December 17.
					
					 He passed away to our deep regret so unexpectedly and so untimely on December 17, 2011. It was the greatest loss in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 He was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, a peerlessly elder statesman and brilliant Songun commander who led the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory with his profound idea and theory and through his extraordinary leadership. He was also a peerless patriot and benevolent father of the people who adorned his revolutionary life with his noble dedication to the motherland and people.
					
					 It is thanks to him that the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung is shedding its bright rays as the guiding idea in the era of independence, the revolutionary tradition of Mt. Paektu was firmly defended, the might of the Workers' Party of Korea and army and the national power of the DPRK strengthened in every way and a great heyday of national prosperity unprecedented in the history spanning five thousand years opened up.
					
					 He firmly defended socialism in the grimmest ordeals and provided the powerful political, military and economic foundation for the eternal prosperity of the nation. This is the greatest exploit performed by him.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have keenly realized that they had made revolution under the leadership of the great man, the sun of the nation and their father. They are firmly determined to carry out his desire and cause to the end.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, the great successor to the Juche cause, who is identical to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership, traits and benevolence is leading the Korean people.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in the UK, Uganda and Indonesia between December 5 and 9 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and University of London, Presidency, National Resistance Movement, Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Kyambogo University, Makerere University and the National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement in Uganda, companies in Indonesia and the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said that Kim Jong Il was a brilliant Songun commander who consolidated the defence capabilities of the country in every way to firmly defend and glorify socialism, holding high the banner of Songun, adding:
					
					 He smashed the imperialists' moves against socialism and the DPRK and advanced socialism dynamically through his Songun revolutionary leadership. This is his extraordinary contribution to the global cause of independence.
					
					 A professor of University of London said Kim Jong Il was a gifted thinker and theoretician who clearly indicated the way for the popular masses to carry out the cause of independence and that the position and significance of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung in the world history have been clearer thanks to the ideological and theoretical activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers including the senior adviser to the Ugandan president praised Kim Jong Il for making a great contribution to the cause of anti-imperialist independence.
					
					 Speakers at the seminar held in Indonesia expressed the conviction that Korea will be surely reunified in the near future under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, saying that peace on the Korean Peninsula has been ensured and Korean style socialism won victory after victory despite vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces as Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics.
					
					 They said that exploits Kim Jong Il performed in accomplishing the global cause of independence will be immortal.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in the UK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias ante el feretro del difunto Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias ante el feretro del difunto Kim Kuk Thae
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un visito el dia 15 el feretro del difunto Kim Kuk Thae, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y presidente de la Comision de Control del CC del PTC. 
					Al pie del feretro, estaban colocadas una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal y las otras en nombre del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares. 
					
					El Mariscal guardo un momento de silencio en memoria del fallecido y dio una vuelta a su feretro muy entristecido por haber perdido al soldado revolucionario fiel al partido quien hasta el ultimo momento de su vida, dedico todo lo suyo por el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche en acato a la direccion del partido y el lider. 
					
					Luego, expreso profundas condolencias a los familiares del difunto y les dijo cordiales palabras de consuelo. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Won Hong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Jae Il, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto adscrita a la unidad 313 del EPC. 
					El Comandante Supremo la visito el 27 de mayo pasado y dijo en esa ocasion al gerente que le carteara cuando logre capturar 4 mil toneladas de peces. 
					
					Los empleados capturaron durante 6 meses mas de 4 mil toneladas y dirigieron una carta al Comandante Supremo. 
					
					Entonces, el envio al gerente el siguiente autografo expresandole su gran confianza y carino. 
					
					"!Companero Yun Yong Il!
					
					Lei con mucho placer su carta. 
					
					Envio mis saludos a los empleados de su empresa que lograron gran exito en la pesca. 
					
					Gracias. 
					
					Estoy seguro de que ustedes pescaran tambien en el proximo ano los peces tan abundantes como cosechas del otono. 
					
					Buena salud para todos. 
					
					Kim Jong Un
					
					El 11 de diciembre de 2013"
					
					Despues de enviar este autografo, el Comandante Supremo volvio a visitar la empresa. 
					
					Diciendo que tiene mucha gana de ver los pescados, el se dirigio al deposito de pescados salados y al de pescados congelados. 
					
					Estos depositos estan repletos de pescados y me da lastima alejarme de aqui, dijo y se retrato con los funcionarios tomando como fondo los pescados a ser suministrados a los militares. 
					
					Cuan alegres se habrian puesto el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il si hubieran visto el monton de estos pescados, dijo.
					
					Agrego que le viene a la memoria la imagen del Dirigente quien derramaba lagrimas de alegria cada vez que recibia el parte de que los militares se alimentaban bien. 
					
					Evaluo como heroe al gerente Yun Yong Il quien materializo a todo trance la orden dada por el partido conduciendo a sus empleados, y expreso agradecimiento en nombre del Comandante Supremo a todos los empleados de la empresa. 
					
					Y les invito a Pyongyang para que ellos puedan dar el parte de fidelidad a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y tomar una foto de recuerdo con el Comandante Supremo. 
					
					El Mariscal recorrio luego la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial, recien acondicionadas. 
					
					Instruyendo capturar mucho mas peces en el proximo ano, fijo la meta y enseno los remedios concretos para alcanzarla. 
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa suministraran a los militares mucho mas pescados y se fotografio con ellos. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al rey de Bahrein
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al rey de Bahrein 
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este lunes un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Bahrein, Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, con motivo del dia nacional de ese reino. 
					El remitente desea al destinatario buena salud y felicidad, asi como exitos en sus trabajos para la estabilidad social y la prosperidad economica.

articles.title: Presidente ecuatoriano desea desarrollo de relaciones con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente ecuatoriano desea desarrollo de relaciones con RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Republica del Ecuador, Rafael Correa, se reunio el dia 12 en el Palacio Presidencial con el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, quien preside la delegacion coreana al XVIII Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes.
					En la ocasion el mandatario dijo que la participacion de la delegacion coreana en el festival estimula mucho al pueblo ecuatoriano que lucha contra el imperialismo, y deseo que se amplien y se desarrollen las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar rindieron el dia 16 el homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il tras colocar los cestos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu. 
					Entre ellos figuran los miembros del cuerpo de consejeros economicos y comerciales, la Embajada de la Republica Popular China, la de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, las oficinas de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Agricultura y la Alimentacion, el Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo, el Fondo de las Naciones Unidas para la Infancia, la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud y el Programa Mundial de Alimento, acreditados en Corea, la familia del martir revolucionario antijapones de China Zhang Weihua, la de Zhou Wei, hija de Zhou Baozhong, chino relacionado con la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa, la de Chae Se Yong, la de Kim Sun Ok, compatriota relacionada con la lucha antijaponesa residente en China, y la de Son Won Thae, compatriota en ultramar relacionado con el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
